Container.Name: Ripper
Container.Category: Backup: MediaApp:Video MediaApp:Music MediaApp:Other Productivity: Tools:
Container.Overview: This container will detect optical disks by their type and rip them automatically.
Container.Description: This container will detect optical disks by their type and rip them automatically.[BR] [BR] -CDs are ripped to MP3/FLAC[BR] -DVDs and BluRays are ripped to MKV[BR] -Data Disks are cloned to ISO[BR] [BR] [B]To properly detect optical disk types in a docker environment this script relies on makemkvcon output.[/B][BR] [BR] MakeMKV is free while in Beta, but requires a valid license key. Ripper tries to fetch the latest free beta key on launch. Without a purchased license key Ripper may stop running at any time.[BR] [BR] To add your purchased license key to MakeMKV/Ripper add it to the enter-your-key-then-rename-to.settings.conf at app_Key = "[ENTER KEY HERE]" and rename the file to settings.conf. [BR] Running multiple instances of Ripper on the same machine is not recommended, but required to rip multiple drives at the same time.[BR] You need to disable "privileged mode" to isolate each drive into separate containers.
